text: La Vespière-Friardel is a commune. It is found in the region Normandy in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of La Vespière (the seat) and Friardel.Arrêté préfectoral 22 December 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Calvados
title: La Vespière-Friardel
